team.title: Our Team
team.subtitle: Meet our experts
team.description: We are a team of professionals dedicated to drone services with passion and attention to detail. We specialize in videos, photography, aerial shots with drones, and other drone services. Each member of our team contributes their expertise to create exceptional results for our clients.

member1.name: J치n Nov치k
member1.description: With over 10 years of experience in drone flying, J치n is our chief pilot. He specializes in technical flights, mapping, and security operations. He is a certified pilot with a license for commercial flights.

member2.name: M치ria Kov치캜ov치
member2.description: M치ria is our creative soul who transforms raw footage into compelling stories. With extensive experience in production and post-production, she creates videos that capture the emotions and beauty of every project.

member3.description: Peter is an expert in photography and post-production. With a perfect sense of detail and composition, he creates images that capture the unique perspective from the sky. His work has been awarded at several international competitions.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Professional drone services for your needs

carousel.title: Our Services
carousel.subtitle: We offer a wide range of professional drone services for your needs

card1.title: Video Production and Video Creation
card1.description: Complete video production from script, through filming to post-production. We create custom advertising, presentation and promotional videos for companies, real estate agencies, hotels, events and social media.

card2.title: Photography
card2.description: We offer professional photography of real estate, events, products and other objects with emphasis on detail, composition and post-production. The resulting photographs are suitable for web, print and social media.

card3.title: Aerial Shots with Drone
card3.description: We capture your property, area, event or landscape from above in top quality. Aerial shots are ideal for presentations, marketing, monitoring and documentation.

card4.title: Have Footage and Need Post-Production?
card4.description: Post-production is what turns ordinary video into content that engages and stays in memory. Send us your materials and we'll bring them to life. We'll take care of precise editing, balanced colors, the right music and subtle effects that underline the atmosphere and story of your video.

step1.title: Write to Us
step1.description: Send us an email at info@droneye.sk with your idea, the concept you're interested in, location and the expected date of flying.

step2.title: Consultation, Advice
step2.description: Together we will agree on a date, go through your idea and video goals in detail and then connect it with our creativity and experience.

step3.title: Permission
step3.description: We will then secure all necessary pre-flight permits and administration for you in accordance with the applicable rules of the given country.

step4.title: Flying
step4.description: On the agreed date we will arrive at the location and carry out filming according to the pre-agreed concept.

step5.title: Post-Production
step5.description: We will take care of professional photo editing and video editing to licensed music, and on request we will further adjust the content according to your ideas.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Get in touch with us for your needs
